translation.Olá, eu me chamo João Paulo, tenho 23 an: Hello, my name is João Paulo, I'm 23 years old and I live in Brazil, I graduated in 2022 in Computer Science at EEP (Escola de Engenharia de Piracicaba), currently I'm working at C.C.R.C.C. (Centro Cultural e Recreativo Cristóvão Colombo) as a computer technician.
translation.Pretendo trabalhar em uma área voltada a: I intend to work in an area focused on web development, specifically in Front-end using ReactJS.
